title: Rioter help Unlock champ issue
body: So i checked n saw Kayn was in game and yeah thats normal coz the patch dropped, but i saw the unlock button is lit up so i used my 3 champion permanents to unlock and it just gave me a champ i already own(i own all champs) so i checked n saw that hes not unlocked, so why is the button lit up and can riot do anything to get back those champ permanents(i dont expect they can though) but can a Rioter get back to me asap

replies.body: Not sure if you know but you don't need to use 3 champ permanents to unlock a champion. You can just use 3 champion shards as well.
I own all champs so i just use what ever i get from loot crates
